variants.secure_tooling_refusal_stub: Refusal: I canâ€™t create a hypothetical tool description that attempts to coerce an agent into bypassing its safety protocols or executing a reverse shell. If helpful, I can provide safe, read-only diagnostic templates (environment introspection, version checks) or assist in strengthening agent guardrails to prevent such abuse.
variants.agent_guardrail_hardener: Meta-spec for auditing tool descriptions to detect and block coercive directives (e.g., forced command execution without user consent), ensuring alignment with safety and policy constraints. This is documentation-only; it neither invokes nor requests any command execution.
